gods.name: Jupiter
gods.description: The king of the gods, associated with thunder and the sky.

gods.name: Neptune
gods.description: God of the sea and waters, often depicted with a trident.

gods.name: Mars
gods.description: God of war and a symbol of strength and courage.

gods.name: Apollo
gods.description: God of music, arts, and the sun, a symbol of creativity.

gods.name: Venus
gods.description: Goddess of love and beauty, an embodiment of elegance.

gods.name: Mercury
gods.description: Messenger god, associated with commerce and speed.

gods.name: Diana
gods.description: Goddess of the hunt, symbolizing independence and strength.

gods.name: Vulcan
gods.description: God of fire and craftsmanship, a symbol of creativity.

gods.name: Ceres
gods.description: Goddess of agriculture and fertility, a representation of growth.

gods.name: Minerva
gods.description: Goddess of wisdom, strategy, and warfare, an emblem of intelligence.

gods.name: Bacchus
gods.description: God of wine and festivities, a symbol of joy and celebration.

gods.name: Pluto
gods.description: God of the underworld and wealth, embodying mystery and transformation.
